title: Twelve-year ban for 'misogynistic' women's coach
description: A former women's football coach is banned from the sport for 12 years after bombarding players and a member of staff with explicit images and suggesting they have sex.

title: Avoiding FPL & watching sunrise - how players cope with jetlag
description: Tennis players might be considered super-human but they suffer with jetlag like the rest of us - particularly when they travel to the Australian Open.

description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on WWE superstar Drew McIntyre - and AI - with his predictions for this week's Premier League fixtures.

description: Manchester City have upped the ante in the Premier League title race by flexing their muscles in the January transfer window.

title: The dramatic 24 hours that sealed Guehi and Glasner's futures
description: BBC Sport looks at a dramatic 24 hours for Crystal Palace as captain Marc Guehi agrees to join Manchester City and manager Oliver Glasner confirms he is leaving in the summer.

title: It's 2016! How much do you remember from sport 10 years ago?
description: What was 2016 like in the world of sport? Here are seven questions to unlock some core memories.

title: Will anyone stop Alcaraz and Sinner, and how far can Raducanu go at Aussie Open?
description: Era-defining rivalries continue and career Grand Slams could be unlocked as the Australian Open starts on Sunday.

title: From Fiji to Latvia - are cross-border leagues the future?
description: The OFC Professional League kicks off this week and a Baltic League has been proposed, so is there a future for cross-border football competitions?

title: World Sports Photography Awards 2026 winner revealed
description: BBC Sport and the World Sport Photography Awards present a selection of the world's finest sporting images from this year's competition.

title: Rejections, depression & promise to his mum - Thiago's route to top
description: Igor Thiago's route to the Premier League has been far from straightforward - BBC Sport charts the rise of Brentford's record-breaking Brazilian striker.

title: Tactics, transfers and turmoil - inside the fall of Amorim
description: After 14 months, Ruben Amorim has been sacked by Manchester United - but where did it all go wrong?

description: Sir David Attenborough explores the surprising wildlife of his hometown ‚Äì London.

title: Christopher Nolan's epic biopic starring Cillian Murphy
description: Watch the multi award-winning film on BBC iPlayer now

title: Booze, beach, beaten - how England lost the Ashes
description: BBC Sport chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt reveals the inside story of England's Ashes defeat in Australia on and off the pitch.

title: I've realised I can make a difference - Hoy
description: In a new BBC documentary, Sir Chris Hoy shows how he is using his Olympic mindset to reframe his purpose following a terminal cancer diagnosis.

title: Inside McLaren's season - the rules, values, incidents & relationships
description: Intra-team title battles turn toxic far more often than not. Andrew Benson analyses how McLaren have maintained relative harmony between Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri.

title: England's AI World Cup masterplan - from perfecting penalties to powering players
description: BBC Sport hears from inside the England setup about how artificial intelligence is powering plans for next summer's World Cup.
